thread.title: Brooke S
thread.title_full: Mystery Tackle Box reviewed by Brooke S

author: Brooke S
title: Brooke S
text:
I bought this as a Christmas gift for my, very hard to buy for, Dad. He has received two months so far, and loves it! He enjoys getting something fun in the mail, discovering all he received that month and then heading out on the lake to give his new tackle a try!
He received two months of the ice fishing box, and we've now changed his subscription to walleye. Switching species was easy and hassle free.
I have suggested Mystery Tackle Box to so many already, and Dad isn't even half way through his subscription.
